minecraft:written_book_content.title: Settler's Journal #5
minecraft:written_book_content.author: Unknown
pages:
[{"underlined":true,"translate":"nitdim.book.town.5.1","fallback":"Rainsuary 1st"},{"underlined":false,"translate":"nitdim.book.town.5.2","fallback":"
It took two months to erect a headstone for all of the dead. A battlefield graveyard, none marked. We could not tell the bones of the villagers from the invaders; their bones were all blackened and crumbling.
Hundreds of us, from all across the"}]

{"translate":"nitdim.book.town.5.3","fallback":"In Between. And only a dozen left. We pushed back those horrible creatures, and that thing... That Tyrant. But Regalli believes it will be back.
We will return to our village in the morning. I hope I can hold back my tears when I look into my daughter\'s eyes again."}
